xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('Schools.SchoolsClass')) #set ($discard = $services.localization.use('document', 'Schools.SchoolsTranslations')) (% class="xform" %) ((( ; <label for="Schools.SchoolsClass_0_name">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('name', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('name') ; <label for="Schools.SchoolsClass_0_country">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('country', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('country') ; <label for="Schools.SchoolsClass_0_jobType">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('jobType', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('jobType') ; <label for="Schools.SchoolsClass_0_url">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('url', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('url') ; <label for="Schools.SchoolsClass_0_contacts">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('contacts', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('contacts') ; <label for="Schools.SchoolsClass_0_internshipEmail">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('internshipEmail', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('internshipEmail') ; <label for="Schools.SchoolsClass_0_internshipUrl">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('internshipUrl', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('internshipUrl') ; <label for="Schools.SchoolsClass_0_content1">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('content1', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('content1') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
